messages.subject: for -t und mantis dude
messages.msgSnippet: a while back, we were talking about a fitting with what looks like a mantis. I recalled I made the comment that it looks like a male mantis after sex ( meaning
messages.messageBody:
a while back, we were talking about a fitting with what looks like a
mantis.
I recalled I made the comment that it looks like a male mantis after
sex ( meaning the head was eaten by his over zealous lover ).

While looking at Joly's big book ( Naunton's collection ), I come
across just that critter......... item # 4513, it's a menuki labelled
as a horned grasshopper.
Just though you guys may like to know.

Milt
